choices: Yes, and they are buck naked when they arrive on the giant world.
Yes, and they are clothed when they arrive on the giant world.
11.content:
It is the year 2045, and a medium size high altitude spacecraft is transporting a group of lovely female cheerleaders, female gymnasts, and female swimmers to an event on Earth, when their ship suddenly goes through a wormhole and lands on a world ruled by giant humans, nonhuman or both. There are some male Earthlings on board the ship, but the majority of the passengers are female. Most of the pilots and crew are female as well. Most of the passengers are 12 to 17 years old, and there are a few adult passengers on board too. Mostly the kids parents. All of the tiny humans clothes could mysteriously vanish while going through the wormhole, or they could be taken off them by a giant, your choice.

Does this choice interest you?
11.title: Trapped in space.

111.content: A high altitude, luxury space plane is traveling from California to London for an event. This unarmed space plan has everything on board like showers, a kitchen, sleeping quarters you name it. As it cruises above the stratosphere towards London, it is seven hours away when suddenly an eerie wormhole opens up before the craft sucking it in. The craft emerges on the other side intake, but it has to land. The main engines are gone. The mostly undamaged ship gently lands in a clearing of some kind. The ship is undamaged, except for the main engines, the scanners, and the main communication system are gone. As the ship rests, the tiny, mostly female Earthlings on board the ship are all passed out inside the craft and for some mysterious reason they are all naked as the day they were born. Even the clothes in the storage area along with most of the blankets and the towels have vanished. The ship is where?
111.title: Yes, and they are buck naked when they arrive.

choices: Some of the passengers begin to wake
The Beach is not as empty as first thought
1111.content: The crashing ship flies lower to the ground before it hits the sand, the ship continues to glide along the sand before lightly hitting a hill. some of the glass windows had shattered including the cockpit windows on impact of the hill. After a while all that was heard was the sound of the ocean, the spaceship had landed on a beach and there was no one around as the day was overcast threatening rain. The lights on the ship had gone out leaving the inside of the ship in darkness. The thing was though even though the ship had landed on what appeared to be a beach was it really still Earth?
1111.title: Park, lake or beach?

choices: An all Girls High School Camp?
A High School Swim School Camp?
12.content: What type of Camp is it?
12.title: Females at camp?

choices: A Mysterious Fog/Mist descends outside the school/college
The School gets sucked into another dimension
13.content: It was a normal school day for Emma at Harbor View School For Girls, A High School/College for Young Women. The School itself was over 300 years old but it's only in the last 20 years that the school has been upgraded with a College added. Emma is an 18 year old, she has shoulder length red hair, she has brown eyes and wears glasses, she has size D breasts, Emma was dressed in the Harbor View uniform. The uniform consists of a pale Blue Skirt that comes down to the knees, a White Button up Shirt, a Dark Green NeckTie and a Pale Blue Blazer. It was now the late afternoon most of the classes had finished for the day. Emma was also part of the School's cheerleading group. Emma headed towards the hall where the cheerleading practice was held, on the way there she ran into another of the cheerleading crew and her friend Rachel, Rachel was a year younger than Emma at 17 years old, she has short blonde hair which reaches her neck. She was also wearing the same school outfit as Emma. "Hi Emma, heading to practice?" "Hi Rachel, sure am let's head there together." The two women headed to practice not knowing that their lives were about to change forever.
13.title: Females at school?

14.content: Hi my name is Cassie. i just picked up my thirteen year daughter Zoe along with her friend Penny from cheerleader practice. they are in their cheerleader uniforms. Penny is also thirteen. we not to far from the school when my car breaks down. to make matters worse my car is a convertible. lucky for me i do keep a tarp in my trunk. I am not able to put the top up on my car. I do however use the tarp to cover my car. we manage to get it covered just before the rain starts. we don't want to take shelter in the old spooky house but having no choice we run inside. we see that is going to rain for awhile decide to look for bathroom. we all need to use it. we stick together. just as we find a bathroom
14.title: Females find a haunted house?

choices: Penny goes up the spiral Staircase alone.
Cassie goes up the spiral staircase alone.
142.content: Cassie, Zoe and Penny find themselves in a large Foyer area with several rooms on their left and right there is also what appears to be a large spiral staircase in the center of the foyer and at the back of the foyer was a large living room. Zoe and Penny looked through the doors on the right hand side to find a Kitchen and to their luck a bathroom. Zoe walks into the bathroom first, "It doesn't look as if anyone has lived here for centuries" She thought as she sat down on the toilet, Meanwhile back with Cassie and Penny even though they too need to use the bathroom they decided to look around some more.
142.title: reader choice

1422.content: I really need to use the restroom. I tell Penny I am going to upstairs to see if there is another bathroom. she chooses to wait on Zoe. When I get upstairs the first two rooms I see is bedrooms. Lucky the third is a bathroom. After I use it I go back downstairs. I find Zoe is waiting for me at the bottom of the stairs. she asks what we are going to do. I tell her we going to wait until the rain stops. Then we going to walk to the next house down the road. What we don't know is that my car vanishes from the side of the road. We hear Penny scream something about a huge rat and then her running out of the bathroom. We see her running
1422.title: Cassie goes up the spiral staircase alone.

14222.content: Penny is screaming huge rat. I calm her down. I then ask her about her skirt and panties. She then realise she is naked from the waist down. She covers herself. I tell her I will go get her clothes. I go and find that her clothes are missing. I look all over the bathroom but don't see her clothes. I go back to the girls and tell them. They are not happy. We try to leave but find we can't open the door. We look for another way out but also keeping an eye for anyone else. We are about to go into a room when the floor beneath us vanishes. We drop down into a slide. As we slide down one of us ends
14222.title: naked from waist down

info.brief_description: "Original Idea by Rodan" A bunch of different females get in trouble.
info.description:
(This story is being used with User Rodan's permission)

A story where a bunch of girls and teenagers find themselves in all sorts of situations and events that lead into dangerous situations for them. Please have fun and enjoy, The girls can be in any situation you can think off.

A few rules, Characters must be over 12 years old if children appear in the story they must be background characters or related to the characters.
Children can not be harmed.
No diapers, pee, shit, etc.
swearing is allowed.
